clearable.description: Whether or not to display a clear button

size.description: Enter the size of the field

placeholder.description: Placeholder content when not in scope
placeholder.description_zh: 非范围选择时的占位内容

start-placeholder.description: The placeholder content for the start date when the range is selected
start-placeholder.description_zh: 范围选择时开始日期的占位内容

end-placeholder.description: The placeholder content for the end date when the scope is selected
end-placeholder.description_zh: 范围选择时结束日期的占位内容

time-arrow-control.description: Whether or not to use arrows for time selection
time-arrow-control.description_zh: 是否使用箭头进行时间选择

type.default: year | month | date | week | datetime | datetimerange | daterange

format.description: The format that appears in the input box
format.description_zh: 显示在输入框中的格式

popper-class.description: The class name of the DateTimePicker drop-down box

:picker-options.description: Refer to the following table for options specific to the current time date selector
:picker-options.description_zh: 当前时间日期选择器特有的选项参考下表

:default-value.description: Optionally, the time displayed by default when the selector is turned on
:default-value.description_zh: 可选，选择器打开时默认显示的时间

default-time.description: The default specific moment after the date is selected
default-time.default: 非范围选择时：形如`12:00:00`的字符串；范围选择时：数组，长度为 2，每项值为字符串，形如`12:00:00`，第一项指定开始日期的时刻，第二项指定结束日期的时刻。不指定会使用时刻 `00:00:00`
default-time.type: 非范围选择时：string | 范围选择时：string[]
default-time.description_zh: 选中日期后的默认具体时刻

value-format.description: Optionally, the format of the bound value. If not specified, the binding value is a Date object
value-format.description_zh: 可选，绑定值的格式。不指定则绑定值为 Date 对象

unlink-panels.description: Unlink the two date panels in the range selector
unlink-panels.description_zh: 在范围选择器里取消两个日期面板之间的联动

prefix-icon.description: Customize the class name of the head icon
prefix-icon.description_zh: 自定义头部图标的类名

clear-icon.description: Customize the class name of the clear icon
clear-icon.description_zh: 自定义清空图标的类名

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the user confirms the selected value
events.params: 组件绑定值。格式与绑定值一致，可受 `value-format` 控制
events.description_zh: 用户确认选定的值时触发

events.name: blur
events.description_zh: 当 input 失去焦点时触发

events.name: focus
events.description_zh: 当 input 获得焦点时触发

pickerOptions.name: shortcuts
pickerOptions.description: 设置快捷选项，需要传入 { text, onClick } 对象用法参考 demo 或下表

pickerOptions.name: disabledDate
pickerOptions.description: 设置禁用状态，参数为当前日期，要求返回 Boolean

Shortcuts.name: onClick
Shortcuts.description: 选中后的回调函数，参数是 vm，可通过触发 'pick' 事件设置选择器的值。例如 vm.$emit('pick', new Date())
